name: Let's NOT Save The World
description:
Have you ever considered what it's like to be an ordinary civilian trying to survive in a city where there's all those supervillains making life a living hell? Have you ever considered what it's like to be said civilian trying to avoid becoming a superhero because they simply can't be asked? Even if you haven't, here's a choose your own adventure where you simply have to survive doing nothing. Easy enough, right?
...Right?
